name: ColdFusion: Avoid  Queries using NOT IN
description: Templates should not use NOT IN clause in SQL statement
output:
This report lists all CFQueries with SQL statement using NOT IN clause.
It provides the following information:
- CFQueries full name
- Count of NOT IN
rationale: Having complex queries in artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries using NOT IN is considered complex and not efficient.
remediation: Review the design of the query to avoid if possible NOT IN clause. Consider using OUTER JOIN is test prove it is more efficient in performance and readability

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
